name: No security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389 (RDP)
query: {securityGroups(where: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", sourceFromPort_LTE: 3389, sourceToPort_GTE: 3389, OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}]}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
